response.overview: Suzume, 17, lost her mother as a little girl. On her way to school, she meets a mysterious young man. But her curiosity unleashes a calamity that endangers the entire population of Japan, and so Suzume embarks on a journey to set things right.
response.tagline: On the other side of the door, was time in its entirety.
response.title: Suzume

titles.title: 铃芽之旅
